title: Russia's Chubais resigns as Putin's special representative due to war - sources - Reuters.com
content: Russia's Chubais resigns as Putin's special representative due to war - sources  Reuters.comView Full Coverage on Google News
description: Anatoly Chubais, the architect of Russia's post-Soviet economic reforms, has quit his post as a Kremlin special envoy and left the country due to the war in Ukraine, two sources told Reuters, the highest profile protest by a Russian figure against the invasion.
